options.name: Chill Wind Starfield
options.explain:
Lv. 50/85/100 Active Skill Atk. +10%
Atk. Increase +70%

[Sweeping Storm]
Lv. 50/85/100 skills create a Sweeping Storm that attacks enemies.
- Sweeping Storm damage 4,585%

[Gale's Rest]
Applies the following effects with the power of the winds that envelop the land. (Buffers excluded)
- Energy Beyond Limit's [Release Limiter] option can't be activated.
- Awakening skill link canceled
- Lv. 50 Skill Atk. +10%
- Lv. 50 skill cooldown -50%

Overall Damage +15%

[Forbidden Magic Pact]
Forms a forbidden magic pact to lose blood and link magic to life.
- Consumes MP instead of HP when casting skills or when attacked.
- Restores MP by 100% of HP healing amounts.
- Max HP restricted to 99%
